quiz.instructions: This quiz contains 20 multiple-choice questions. Each question may have 1, 2, 3, or 4 correct answers. Answer all questions to get your final score. When finished, type 'TERMINER' or 'FIN' to get your score.

questions.questionText: Which Google Cloud service can be used to create a data lake for storing raw New York taxi trip data?
How can Cymbal Retail use Cloud Pub/Sub to manage real-time inventory updates?
Which Google Cloud service is suitable for running SQL queries on large datasets, such as New York taxi trip data?
How can Cymbal Retail use Dataflow to process sales data in real-time?
What is a key advantage of using Cloud Composer for Cymbal Retail's data orchestration needs?
options: Integration with multiple Google Cloud services

questions.questionText: Which Google Cloud service can be used to visualize New York taxi trip data for business insights?

How can Cymbal Retail utilize Cloud Spanner for their transactional database needs?
Which Google Cloud service can be used to store and analyze large volumes of New York taxi trip data?
How can Dataflow be used to handle late data arrival in a streaming pipeline for Cymbal Retail?
options: Storing late data in Cloud Storage

questions.questionText: Which service is best suited for creating machine learning models to analyze customer behavior for Cymbal Retail?
